sentences.english: Revolving pushing is one of the methods of pushing shot.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉推鉛是推鉛球的方法之一。

sentences.english: The world, however, is full of more complicated systems than a shot-put toss.
sentences.chinese: 然而，世界上的系統幾乎都比推鉛球複雜得多。

sentences.english: When I was 10 years old , I became a shot-put athlete.
sentences.chinese: 我10歲時，成爲了一名鉛球運動員。

sentences.english: Shot putting is an event with hundred years development process.
sentences.chinese: 推鉛球運動，經歷了幾百年的發展過程。

sentences.english: He has hung up a new record for shot put.
sentences.chinese: 他創造了鉛球的新紀錄。

sentences.english: After all, even Olympic shot-putters toss only 16lb weights.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，奧運會鉛球比賽的鉛球重量才16磅。

sentences.english: After all, even Olympic shot-putters toss only 16lb weights.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，奧運會鉛球比賽的鉛球重量才16磅。

sentences.english: The technique of shot put in China mainly focuses on sliding step.
sentences.chinese: 而我國主要普及的是背向滑步推鉛球技術。

sentences.english: U. S. shot putter Adam tries to wrap his mind around gold.
sentences.chinese: 美國鉛球運動員亞當現在一心一意要拿金牌。
